EmailTemplate.subject: Your application for the NCS Programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Welcome back! We are delighted to invite you to return to your role as a {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c} for the 2016 NCS programme.
DBS applications
In order to undertake a role on our programme it is an absolute requirement that candidates have a valid enhanced DBS certificate with children's barred list issued on or after 1st January 2015. Applicants who have not completed this process cannot be prioritised for placement and allocation. The process of obtaining this certification is fully funded by The Challenge and full instructions of the application process can be found here.
https://staffing.the-challenge.org/assets/2016DBSinstructionspostoffer.pdf
If you already have a valid DBS certificate that meets the above criteria then you will be able to upload this within the essential information section of the website. For more information about DBS certificates and applications please visit our FAQs.
Essential Information
Each section of the Essential Information page should be completed before you start your role. This includes:
Providing contact details for 2 referees
Making a tax declaration and providing your bank details (from April)
Filling out our health, safeguarding & inclusion form
Providing details for your emergency contact
Checking your DBS status
Availability and Training
You'll now also have access to the 'Choosing when I can work', 'Dates when I can't work' and 'My summary' pages. Here, you'll be able to choose which work dates you'd like to be considered for, and let us know of any dates when you won't be available to work.
The sooner we have this information, the sooner we'll be able to provisionally allocate you to a work placement.
The 'Booking Training' page is also now open - here, you'll find a choice of dates to choose from for your day of returner training. This training is compulsory, and we can't let you work on the programme without it. Our training sessions fill up fast - login and book your training as soon as possible to secure your place!
Any questions?
As ever, if you have any questions about the programme or your application, please donâ€™t hesitate to get in touch with your local staffing team. Information is also available on our FAQs.
We look forward to working with you again in 2016!
